events.message: I placed my order two weeks ago, but it still hasn’t arrived yet. The shipping status hasn't updated in days.
Identified issue related to delivery delay based on customer’s message mentioning late shipping and no tracking updates.
Assigned support agent to handle the delivery delay case for order #45678910.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear that your order hasn’t arrived yet. I’m here to help and will look into the delay immediately.
Could you please confirm the order number and the shipping address to help me track your package accurately?
Sure, the order number is 45678910, and the shipping address is 123 Maple Street, Springfield.
Thank you for the information. I contacted the shipping company and found out your package is delayed due to weather issues. We expect delivery within three days.
I appreciate the update. I understand weather can cause delays, so I will wait for a few more days.
Your package has been delivered successfully as per latest tracking update. Please let us know if you have any other concerns.
Just checking in to ensure you received your order and everything is satisfactory. We’re here if you need anything else.
Closing the case as the delivery issue has been resolved and no further action is required on your part.
